description: Collect valuable information you need from LinkedIn profiles, including emails

outputDescription.subscribers: How many subscribers does she/he have
outputDescription.company: What is the name of the company she/he is currently working for
outputDescription.companyUrl: What is the url of the company she/he is currently working for
outputDescription.jobTitle: What is her/his current job title
outputDescription.mail: Email address displayed on profile page (very few people do that)
outputDescription.email from Dropcontact.io: result of an email request with Dropontact (if activated)
outputDescription.email from Hunter.io: result of an email request with Hunter (if activated)
outputDescription.email from Phantombuster: result of an email request with Phantombuster (if activated)
outputDescription.skill: all skills and endorsements for each one

helpers: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL, a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) or a single LinkedIn Profile URL
Please be gentle. This API will manipulate LinkedIn on your behalf. Scraping 100+ profiles in a short period of time is not recommended.
spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL of profiles to scrape (?)

columnName.label: Column name from which to get profile URLs
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet (column A)

hunterApiKey.label: Email discovery: Hunter.io API key (optional) (?)
hunterApiKey.helper: Leave this field empty if you don't want to use Hunter.io

dropcontactApiKey.label: Email discovery and Data Validation: Dropcontact.io API key (optional) (?)
dropcontactApiKey.helper: Leave this field empty if you don't want to use Dropcontact.io

numberOfAddsPerLaunch.label: Number of profiles to visit per launch (100 max.) (?)

saveImg.rightLabel: Save the profile picture as a jpeg

takeScreenshot.rightLabel: Take a full size screenshot of the profile

takePartialScreenshot.rightLabel: Take a partial size screenshot of the profile
